overview: When doctors diagnosed 19-year-old rock star Jason Becker with Lou Gehrig's Disease, they said he would never make music again and that he wouldnâ€™t live to see his 25th birthday. 22 years later, without the ability to move or to speak, Jason is alive and making music with his eyes.
tagline: It's a much bigger reason than anybody out there knows why he's still here. But he's still here.
title: Jason Becker: Not Dead Yet
